subject: Super Bowl
Football
lead_paragraph: Ann Mara, the mother of the Giants’ president and C.E.O. John Mara, rarely misses a game. Sunday’s Super Bowl is no exception even though she has a broken right shoulder.
snippet: Ann Mara, the mother of the Giants’ president and C.E.O. John Mara, rarely misses a game. Sunday’s Super Bowl is no exception even though she has a broken right shoulder.
